newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: Portugal's CMVM to lift suspension CPP shares.
newsitem.headline: Portugal's CMVM to lift suspension CPP shares.

text.p: Portugal's Financial Markets Committee (CMVM) has decided to lift a suspension in shares of bank Credito Predial Portugues (CPP) at 1000 GMT, a CMVM official said.
Yesterday the Champalimaud group announced a public offer to buy (OPA) for CPP, a unit of Champalimaud's Banco Totta e Acores, at a price of 1,800 escudos per share.
CPP closed yesterday at 2,075 escudos per share.
